document_data.mainbody:
Mariochar Bladebeard was a shrewd, clanless male dwarf who ruled the dwarven settlement of Eartheart.
Mariochar was elected ruler of Eartheart by the Deep Lords in 1346 DR. He then went on to be re-elected by them annually over the next twelve years.The sourcebook "Dwarves Deep" takes place in the year 1358 DR and states that the character has held the post of ruler "...for the past dozen years."
